name: So Many Cubes
description:
A chaotic strategy game with cubes!

You have to choose and build deployments to destroy the Mothercube with So Many Cubes

Features

Players
  • Single player vs Bot (game mode 1)
  • Player vs Player (game mode 2)
  • Survival single player (game mode 3)
  • 10+ Cubes: continuous deployment of cubes
  • 10+ Cubes: op turret to use for a limited time
  • 20+ Unique cubes
